data.text: JANUARY 6TH ATTACK ON THE U.S. CAPITOL,
The deposition in the above matter was held via Webex, commencing at 10:00
For the SELECT COMMITTEE TO INVESTIGATE
THE JANUARY 6TH ATTACK ON THE U.S. CAPITOL:
This is a deposition of Joshua Eric Macias
conducted by the House Select Committee to Investigate the January 6th Attack on the
United States Capitol pursuant to House Resolution 503.
Mr. Macias, please state your full name and spell your last name for the record.
And would you please raise your hand to be sworn by the court
My name is Joshua Eric Macias.
Do you solemnly declare and affirm under penalty of perjury that
the testimony you are about to give will be the truth, the whole truth, and nothing but
Mr. Macias, this will be a staff-led deposition.

, and I'm an investigative counsel with the select
For this deposition we will follow the House deposition rules that we provided to

Under the House deposition rules, neither committee members nor staff may

And you and your attorney will have an opportunity to review the transcript.
So before we begin, I'd just like to describe a few ground rules.
There is an official reporter transcribing the record of this deposition, and the
reporters are also joining us by Webex.

the answer, please simply say so.

If the chairman overrules such an objection, you are required to answer that question.

assertion, we will ask that you assert it for the record.
